name: John Muir Elementary School
description: School Type: Early Education, Elementary School Serves grades: PreK, TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper The vision of John Muir Elementary School is to create an environment where students are independent learners and empowered to excel academically and socially.
